A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The poorest writing ever in a Star Wars film. Rose is the most annoying\, pointless character ever\, her stopping Finn's sacrifice (thereby sentencing everyone else to die if this film had any logic) was the dumbest thing I have ever seen in Star Wars. Leia's Mary Poppins moment is a disgrace. Luke criminally under-utilized... need I go on.

This movie killed Star Wars. I'm not even a hardcore fan\, just someone who expects movies to be well-written. Case in point\, I thought Rogue One was very well made. But this was just so inept that if it was not called "Star Wars" people would not ignore how bad this was.

The real story here is how/why these movie critics can give this movie a 90%+ rating; either they are being rewarded by Disney (not necessarily with money) or they are idiots. Either way the system is totally rotten.
